User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build ID: 20110615151330

Steps to reproduce:

While I had updated the firefox to latest versions, jobsdb cannot load the job information correctly. In past old versions like 3.x works perfect 


Actual results:

Enter the URL provided and won't show on the screen


Expected results:

The job information should displayed on right hand side.
